## Core.Albums.get() method

Gets a single album by id.

**Signature:**

```typescript
get(id: string): Result<TA>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  id | string | The <code>id</code> of the album to be retrieved. |

**Returns:**

Result&lt;TA&gt;

`Success` with the matching album, or `Failure` with a message if no matching album is found.
